page.title: 02Somerton Library
page.content: Somerton library is 33 years old. It was there in 1901 but it was a Parish Room Rent library. It is a stone building. In the library there is a famous painting by{Marmaduke Cradock. It is of some peacocks and their chicks in a park. Marmaduke was born in 1660. He lived in Somerton. He died in 1717. The library only opens on Monday,Thursday,Friday and Saturday. In the library there are about 3000 tickets. In the library there are more than 6000 books. The library has three notice boards. One is in the entrance,one in the library and one outside on the wall of the library.
